#define DEFN_REL_OP_T (   tp)
Value:
template <class X> \
inline \
bool \
operator == ( tp b, const sc_proxy<X>& px ) \
{ \
return ( px == b ); \
} \
\
template <class X> \
inline \
bool \
operator != ( const sc_proxy<X>& px, tp b ) \
{ \
return !( px == b ); \
} \
\
template <class X> \
inline \
bool \
operator != ( tp b, const sc_proxy<X>& px ) \
{ \
return !( px == b ); \
}
